C1 [ C ] an amount of money saved, collected, or provided for a particular purpose: pension/trust fund Several financial advisers help manage the pension/trust fund.set up a fund The hospital has set up a special fund to buy new equipment. Contributions are being sought for the disaster fund. funds C1 [ plural ]
money needed or available to spend on something: Following the repairs to the roof, church funds are now seriously depleted.
See more a fund of something UK
a lot of something: She has a fund of knowledge on the subject.
